Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage claims a five-wicket haul with the scalp of Kuldeep Yadav as Sri Lanka beat India by 110 runs to clinch the series 2-0.
Sri Lanka (248/7) beat India (138) by 110 runs to win the three-match series 2-0.
Washington Sundar smacks Jeffrey Vandersay for a six.
Wellalage dismisses Iyer; IND 82/6 in 13 overs.
Sri Lanka post 248/7 (A Fernando 96; R Parag 3/54) in 50 overs.
Riyan picks his third; SL 199/6 in 43.3 overs vs IND.
Riyan strikes again; SL 183/3 in 38 overs.
Riyan dismisses Fernando; SL 171/2 in 35.3 overs.
Avishka dropped; Big over for Lanka.
Maiden followed by an expensive over.

Post-Match Reflections: A dismal batting performance by the Indian batters throughout this series. Apart from Rohit Sharma, the star-studded line-up failed miserably to chase the below 250 targets. A disappointing start to India's preparations for Champions Trophy.
Miscellaneous Highlights: It’s bright and sunny for a chance; let the play begin.
